froth.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a mass of small bubbles on the top of a liquid
froth.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: ‘Excellent beer, ’ he said, wiping the froth from his mouth.
froth.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: small white bubbles of saliva around a person’s or animal’s mouth
froth.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: talk or ideas that are attractive but have no real value or meaning
froth.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: The book has too much froth and not enough fact.
froth.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: if a liquid froths, it produces or contains a lot of small bubbles on top
froth.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: When you first open the bottle the beer will froth for a few seconds.
froth.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: if someone’s mouth froths, saliva comes out as small white bubbles
